section.name: Module 1: Moodle Module Suggestions
section.summary: The examples of online lesson components in this course shell listed below, have been designed with a basic structure aligned to the Teaching Excellence in Adult Literacy (TEAL) Lesson Plan Builder (using a WIPPEA lesson plan model: warm-up, introduction, presentation, practice, evaluation, and application) that allows teachers to create a usable online resource that learners can access anytime with Open Educational Resources selected within the ASSURE Framework.
